title: Sergei Bulgakov's "The Sophiology of Death" - Part 1 - Shari and Michael
description:
Shari and Michael discuss Sergei Bulgakov and his essay titled "The Sophiology of Death".  The essay digs deeply into the Incarnation, the Trinity, and how the Trinity acts together within the passion of Christ.  It also expounds on the mystery of death, sophiology (the wisdom of God), and kenosis.

We also touch on how Bulgakov's work is taken up and/or paralleled in the work of other writers such as Catherine Pickstock, John Milbank, and Owen Barfield.
